description: A plugin manifest for a Jigsaw plugin
title: Jigsaw Plugin Manifest

___name.description: A unique name for the plugin

___module_name.description: The name of the module that will be created from importing this plugin

___dependencies.description: A list of plugins that must be loaded before this plugin can be loaded

___main_class.description: The name of the main plugin class

___path.description: The path of the file that contains the main plugin class
